document.discussion_title: Suzy Hayes (Female Ted Cruz) | Wiki & Bio | Everipedia, everyone's encyclopedia
document.topic_text:
Suzy Hayes (Female Ted Cruz) Copy URL 509 VIEWS Suzy Hayes is the woman who appeared on The Maury show titled "5 Men Tested..Will I Find My Daughter's Father Today?". On the show, she was disputing the paternity of a man named Freddie. [6]
Suzy's image went viral on the internet because she resembles Ted Cruz . [2]
The photo was originally shared on Imgur and went viral on April 19, 2016.
When asked how she feels about resembling Cruz, Suzy said "Idk bc everybody says that I look like him and that that could possibly be my brother or my twin". [7]
Porno website xHamster offered Hayes and her 25 year old fiancee $10,000 to record a six-minute sex tape. The mother of one from Mississippi agreed saying: “I’m fine with it because everything is going to support my family. I want to get my son whatever he wants.” [8] Photo of Suzy.
